name: Midnight Arrow
description:
Midnight Arrow is an atmospheric puzzle platformer that uses a retro art style. Hop on platforms and jump on walls to explore a vast immersive platforming world. Discove the different types of arrows and use them to solve puzzles and illuminate the darkened world around you!



Features


  • Tight smooth platforming
  • Optional quests
  • Collectables
  • Skins
  • 6 areas with new mechanics
  • Puzzles
Light your path through the dark caverns using fire arrows.

Solve puzzles that test your aim, platforming, and dexterity abilities, all at the same time. Each area brings new mechanics that add to the complexity of the platforming and the challenges of the puzzles. The game will have a total of 6 areas each with its own mood and playstyle.

Use different arrows

And Solve optional quests!
